segments.text: I notice the warm light coming into the kitchen from the open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is methodically drying her plate, so serene in her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink overflows silently, water pooling around her unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how something so simple could lead to harm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, their innocent mischief on display.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously, hand in the jar, full of childlike determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it'll be devastating amid the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, her open palm a symbol of their bond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside contrasts this potential sorrow inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang watching the unaware adult miss the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies spilling or a slip could shatter this domestic peace.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a reminder of how fragile everyday moments are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron and dress make her seem so vulnerably ordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them to prevent the sadness ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR
